Resolve repeated answers into one row per submission

Compare two versions of a form

Flag suspicious submissions and enforce pre/post comparability checks

Clean duplicated rows caused by multi-value fields in flattened FormIO data

Interactively review and resolve duplicate submissions

Guided end-to-end workflow (download -> clean -> report -> export)
